/>
IV.i.3.B.1.b
.
Headache Examination Report Review
A neurological headache examination report will be considered insufficient if it does not indicate the frequency of prostrating headaches and whether the headaches are migraine-type or non-migraine type.
Reference
: Â For more information on rating migraines, see
38 CFR 4.124a
, and
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 12.A.3
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Examination Sufficiency for Specific Disabilities
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B
